formattedAddress: 105 Sullivan St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 105 Sullivan St, New York, NY 10012-4810, USA

originalText.text: Eddie is an exceptional person and an outstanding barber! I've been a loyal customer for a long time, and he consistently delivers top-notch haircuts and beard trims. His attention to detail and precision are truly commendable. Not only is Eddie skilled at his craft, but he also creates a friendly and welcoming atmosphere in the shop. I always leave feeling satisfied and confident with my new look. If you're looking for a talented barber who truly cares about his clients, look no further than Eddie. Highly recommended!

text.text: Eddie is an exceptional person and an outstanding barber! I've been a loyal customer for a long time, and he consistently delivers top-notch haircuts and beard trims. His attention to detail and precision are truly commendable. Not only is Eddie skilled at his craft, but he also creates a friendly and welcoming atmosphere in the shop. I always leave feeling satisfied and confident with my new look. If you're looking for a talented barber who truly cares about his clients, look no further than Eddie. Highly recommended!

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Eddie's barbershop, and I must say that I was thoroughly impressed with his polite and professional service. From the moment I walked in the door, Eddie greeted me with a warm smile and made me feel welcome.

Throughout my appointment, Eddie demonstrated a level of skill and expertise that is truly rare in today's world. He took the time to listen to my requests and made sure that I was completely satisfied with the results before I left the chair. His attention to detail was unparalleled, and he clearly takes great pride in his work.

But perhaps most impressive of all was Eddie's professionalism. He was always courteous and respectful, and he conducted himself in a manner that reflected positively on both himself and his business. I felt like I was in good hands the entire time, and I would not hesitate to recommend Eddie to anyone looking for a top-notch barber.

In short, if you're looking for a skilled and professional barber who will treat you with the utmost respect and courtesy, then look no further than Eddie. I can assure you that you will not be disappointed with his services.

originalText.text: I’ve been going here for about 2 years. My barber consistently cuts my hair the way I want it. I particularly like him because he does a good job trimming my beard. He’s willing to trim it the way I like it (not too short). Most other barbers  cut it much shorter than I prefer.

text.text: I’ve been going here for about 2 years. My barber consistently cuts my hair the way I want it. I particularly like him because he does a good job trimming my beard. He’s willing to trim it the way I like it (not too short). Most other barbers  cut it much shorter than I prefer.

originalText.text:
It was a tragedy when the original Bedford Boys, on Third Street, went out of business. It was a joy to see Eddie back with the new crew on Sullivan Street. A haircut with Eddie is like a craft beer with old friends. Besides the perfect skill (calling me back once, because he missed an errant nosehair), you'll feel relaxed and in the company of a friend.

You can go for both the perfect haircut, and the perfect haircut experience.

originalText.text: Great haircut from Eddie.  He’s a super friendly dude and knows what he’s doing.  Thank you again for the great service!
